name: Pump Pick
description:
all controls in start menu

Pumpkins are small when they blink once.

pumpkins are big when they blink again.

pick the pumpkins up, then put them down on the table to sell them to the person who wants one before the timer at the top runs out.

after a little bit, rush hour starts.

the timer is faster, and so are you.

get as many sells as you can before time runs out!

music from:https://opengameart.org/content/nes-shooter-music-5-tracks-3-jingles

art, code, and sound by me.
